sources.name: index.ts
sources.content:
export * from "./native-table.style"
export * as NativeTable from "./namespace"
export type {
  CaptionProps,
  ColgroupProps,
  ColProps,
  NativeTableRootProps,
  TbodyProps,
  TdProps,
  TfootProps,
  TheadProps,
  ThProps,
  TrProps,
} from "./native-table"
export {
  Caption,
  Col,
  Colgroup,
  NativeTablePropsContext,
  NativeTableRoot,
  Tbody,
  Td,
  Tfoot,
  Th,
  Thead,
  Tr,
  useNativeTablePropsContext,
} from "./native-table"

sources.name: namespace.ts
sources.content:
export {
  Caption,
  Col,
  Colgroup,
  NativeTablePropsContext as PropsContext,
  NativeTableRoot as Root,
  Tbody,
  Td,
  Tfoot,
  Th,
  Thead,
  Tr,
  useNativeTablePropsContext as usePropsContext,
} from "./native-table"
export type {
  CaptionProps,
  ColgroupProps,
  ColProps,
  NativeTableRootProps as RootProps,
  TbodyProps,
  TdProps,
  TfootProps,
  TheadProps,
  ThProps,
  TrProps,
} from "./native-table"
